Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do print(instance) wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local vTorso local vHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local Glow_BoolValue = waitForChild(Tool, "Glow") local Light_Weld = waitForChild(Tool, "LightWeld") local Fire_Part = waitForChild(Sword, "FirePart") local Light_Fire = waitForChild(Fire_Part, "LightFire")
local Damage = 15
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local TimeOfDay
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= vHumanoid and vHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if Light_Fire and Light_Fire.Enabled == true then coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") and not humanoid.Parent.Torso:FindFirstChild("LightFire") then local cFire = Light_Fire:Clone() cFire.Parent = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") RBX_Debris:AddItem(cFire, 4) local duration = 4 while duration > 0 do humanoid:TakeDamage(5) duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end end end)) end end end end
function onEquipped() local time = {}
TimeOfDay = game.Lighting.TimeOfDay
for t in string.gmatch(game.Lighting.TimeOfDay, "%d+") do time[#time + 1] = t end
local hours = time[1]
if tonumber(hours) > 6 and tonumber(hours) < 18 and Light_Fire then Damage = 27 Light_Fire.Enabled = true else Damage = 15 Light_Fire.Enabled = false end if Light_Weld then Light_Weld.Parent = Tool end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
function onUnequipped() --if TimeOfDay then game.Lighting.TimeOfDay = TimeOfDay end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Sword.Touched:connect(blow)
function shootLightRay() local time = {}
TimeOfDay = game.Lighting.TimeOfDay
for t in string.gmatch(game.Lighting.TimeOfDay, "%d+") do time[#time + 1] = t end
local hours = time[1] local minutes = time[2]
local ray = Instance.new("Part") ray.Parent = game.Workspace ray.FormFactor = 3 ray.Anchored = true ray.CanCollide = false ray.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.2, 1) ray.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic ray.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Institutional white") ray.Locked = true ray.CFrame = CFrame.new(Fire_Part.CFrame.p, Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)) RBX_Debris:AddItem(ray, 1.5)
-- We don't care about the seconds -- Make it MidNight
local midNightHour = 13 local midNightMinutes = 0 -- Takes 10 steps
if tonumber(hours) == 0 then hours = 24 end --if tonumber(minutes) == 0 then minutes = 60 end
local hoursPerStep = midNightHour/10 local minutesPerStep = midNightMinutes/10
while ray.Size.Y < 200 do ray.Size = ray.Size * Vector3.new(1, 2, 1) ray.CFrame = CFrame.new(Fire_Part.CFrame.p) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -ray.Size/2) wait(0.1) end
local numSteps = 10
while numSteps > 1 do hours = hours + hoursPerStep minutes = minutes + minutesPerStep if tonumber(hours) > 24 then hours = hours%24 end print(hours, minutes) if tonumber(hours) > 0 and tonumber(minutes) > 0 then game.Lighting.TimeOfDay = hours .. ":" .. minutes .. ":" .. "00" end numSteps = numSteps - 1 wait(0.1) end end
function checkForPower() local duration = 30 while duration > 0 do if not game.Workspace:FindFirstChild("Bloom") then duration = 0 end duration = duration - wait() wait() end end
Glow_BoolValue.Changed:connect(function() local wither = game.Workspace:FindFirstChild("Wither") local bloom = game.Workspace:FindFirstChild("Bloom")
if Glow_BoolValue.Value == true and not bloom and vHumanoid then Light_Fire.Enabled = true Damage = 27 vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 bloom = Instance.new("BoolValue") bloom.Name = "Bloom" bloom.Parent = game.Workspace RBX_Debris:AddItem(wither, 30) shootLightRay() vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 21.0 if wither then wither:Destroy() end coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(checkForPower)) wait(30) Damage = 15 vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 Light_Fire.Enabled = false --game.Lighting.TimeOfDay = TimeOfDay wait(15) Glow_BoolValue.Value = false else if not vHumanoid then if Glow_BoolValue then Glow_BoolValue.Value = false end end end end)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local vTorso local vHumanoid
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Slash_Animation local Stab_Animation local Lighten_Animation
local Charge_Animation
local Slash_Sound
local MouseDown_Bool = false
local Camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local Glow_BoolValue local Animating_Bool = false
local function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Animating_Bool == false then MouseDown_Bool = true Charge_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ChargeAnim) Charge_Animation:Play() local currentSpeed = vHumanoid.WalkSpeed while MouseDown_Bool do if game.Workspace:FindFirstChild("Bloom") then vHumanoid:TakeDamage(-0.3) -- Heals 6 hp per second while you are charging end wait() end if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end local vDirection = (vTorso.Position - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit local mDirection = (vHumanoid.TargetPoint - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit
local angleBetweenVectors = math.abs(math.acos(vDirection:Dot(mDirection))) if angleBetweenVectors < 0.5 then Slash_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim) Slash_Animation:Play() else Stab_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StabAnim) Stab_Animation:Play() Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2, 1, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 0, 0, -1) wait(1.3) Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) end vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = currentSpeed else end end)
mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown_Bool = false if Animating_Bool == false then Tool.Enabled = false Animating_Bool = true wait(1.5) Tool.Enabled = true Animating_Bool = false end end)
mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) key = key:lower() if key == "q" then Glow_BoolValue = Tool:FindFirstChild("Glow") local time = {} TimeOfDay = game.Lighting.TimeOfDay for t in string.gmatch(game.Lighting.TimeOfDay, "%d+") do time[#time + 1] = t end local hours = time[1] local minutes = time[2] if Glow_BoolValue and Glow_BoolValue.Value == false and (tonumber(hours) > 18 or tonumber(hours) < 5) then Animating_Bool = true Lighten_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.LightenAnim) Lighten_Animation:Play() wait(0.4) vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 Glow_BoolValue.Value = true wait(2.0) Animating_Bool = false end end end) end
local function onUnequipped() -- Do stuff if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end if Slash_Animation then Slash_Animation:Stop() end if Stab_Animation then Stab_Animation:Stop() end if Lighten_Animation then Lighten_Animation:Stop() end Animating_Bool = false Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, 0, -2, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0) MouseDown_Bool = false vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
